page.title: 10Administration,Salem & dist.
page.content: Salem and district is administered by Dinefwr Borough Council. The district is part of Llandeilo Fawr, and during the County Council elections of 1985, a Social Democratic candidate was returned for the first time. However, at present the district has no strong political bias. Salem has a weekly refuse collection. Plastic bags were introduced at the beginning of 1985 for rubbish.(The outer district has a fortnightly collection) {Law and Order} -Irregular mobile patrols were recently introduced, no permanent police presence in village. the crime rate is almost non existent; 1 burglary in 1984, first ever.Within the immediate village, irregularities are noted, and investigated - the outskirts are not so easily monitored. The nearest Police Station is in Llandeilo.
